Text: Downtown Historic District Restoration Ball December st Cc Dear Ken By what I read youve had quite a time lately Keep up the great work The above will be held at the Houston Club and will be quite a fun event I believe ENRON has participated in the past Tables of are available for and There will be a very nice silent auction too As you know the DHD on whose board I sit does great things for the old part of downtown and many of the facades are a product of the DHDs grants We would really appreciate ENRONs participation Take Care Vince
